title: The best noise-canceling headphones we've tested are at an all-time low price
text:
The best noise-canceling headphones we've tested are at an all-time low price

These are the world-class noise-canceling headphones everyone's been buzzing about. (Photo: Reviewed / Jackson Ruckar)

— Our editors review and recommend products to help you buy the stuff you need. If you make a purchase by clicking one of our links, we may earn a small share of the revenue. However, our picks and opinions are independent from USA Today’s newsroom and any business incentives.

Ever in the mood to tune out the entire world and just focus on a podcast or new album in peace? Same. To do so, you'll need a pair of high-quality, over-ear headphones with top-of-the-line noise-cancellation technology, And right now, eBay is selling brand new pairs of the headphones that do it best, the Sony WH-1000XM3s, for the lowest price we've ever seen them available for.

Currently these Sonys are going for $250 on eBay, which is $100 cheaper than their usual retail price. Earlier this year, We chose the Sonys as the best noise-canceling headphones money can buy, even outperforming the mega popular Bose Quiet Comfort 35 Series II headphones in our tests, which came as a quite a shock to me as a proud owner of the QC35s for years. But even I have to admit, the WH-1000XM3s are truly special.

What gave the Sony WH-1000XM3 over-ear headphones an edge over the Bose QC 35IIs was one feature in particular that Sony aptly titled “Adaptive Sound Control.” This is just a fancy way of saying that the headphones are smart enough to sense your surroundings and adjust the level of active noise-cancellation (or ANC) accordingly, whether you’re on a crowded plane or just trying to focus in a chatty office.

Also worth noting is the touch-controlled “Quick Attention” mode. By placing your hand over the earcup, you can communicate without having to remove your headphones, which, in my opinion, is a total gamechanger for ordering a cup of coffee or having a quick conversation. Not only that, but we found that the Sonys remain comfy after hours of wear, and have an extra long battery life—in short, they’re life-changing, even if you're a Bose loyalist.

Keep in mind that although these aren't being sold directly by Sony, this top-rated seller on eBay has nearly 100% positive feedback, and comes with an eBay Money Back Guarantee in case you're not satisfied for any reason. Pssst, you can also buy refurbished models for just below $200, but either way go, new or refurbished, you definitely won't want to miss out on this eBay deal.
